title.value: Генотипирование Porcine cirvovirus 2 методом полимеразной цепной реакции
Genotyping of Porcine circovirus type 2 by PCR method

journal.title: Epizootiology, Immunobiology, Pharmacology, Sanitary Science : international scientific and practical journal

person.name: Krasnikova, E.L., National Academy of Sciences. Scientific and Practical Center of Animal Breding (Belarus). The S.N. Vyshelesskij Inst. of Experimental Veterinary Medicine

abstract.value: In the conditions of the Republic of Belarus there was realized a study into construction of a PCR-system for the detection of porcine circovirus infection as well as into realization of genotyping of the developed isolyates. Nowadays, laboratory diagnostics of circovirus that circulates in pig-breeding complex of Belarus takes from 10 to 14 days. However, for analysis of epizootic situation accurate, timely diagnostic of PCV2 is necessary to accelerate the process of detection and identification of the causative agent. One of the tools for diagnostic of infection diseases is а polymerase chain reaction (PCR). With help of this reaction, it is possible to detection the causative agent at anyone stage of the disease, including latent, which can significantly reduce the time to diagnosis. Based on identifying genetic factors of pathogenicity test system were created to detection of Porcine circovirus type 2.
